metadata.title: CVE-2019-7147 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: A buffer over-read exists in the function crc64ib in crc64.c in nasmlib inNetwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc16. A crafted asm input can causesegmentation faults, leading to denial-of-service.

criterions.comment: nasm package in esm-apps/focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-04-25').
